name: Blue Cherries & Green Leopard Two Sided Bandana
description:
Blue Cherries or Green Leopard Print, it's your choice! 

This two sided bandana is stitched not only on the inside but the top of the bandana as well. Double stitching ensures durability for your furry one.

Blue Cherries will lighten your day while the Leopard Print brings the wild out in your pup.  Both materials are cotton. 

These bandanas tie either in a double knot or a sailor knot.  

Bandana Options:

If you prefer Velcro, add a dollar onto the price and let me know the exact measurement of your pooch's neck. 

Does your little one hate to dress up but keeps their collar on? Message me and ask for four holes for easier insertion for your belt collar. Just add a dollar!

Would you prefer a hold for an easy connection between your leash and collar? Just add a dollar.

Message me for any of these options. Just let me know. :)
Enjoy the feeling of choice.

As usual if there is more than a $2.00 difference in shipping, it will be refunded through paypal.

options.name: Velcro, Collar Holes or Leash Hole.

name: Pink Camo and Stripes Two Sided Bandana
description:
Not every girl has long hair so that is why they have the choice of a pink bandana. Our Paws on the Trail name for this certain bandana is the 'Sheila Striped Camo".

This mixture of striped pink cotton and pink camo cotton/poly blend was picked by Sheila. She showed up at ever market waiting for a two sided, pink on both sides, bandana. She has a pink camo theme for her pup so that's why she picked pink camo and stripes.

For every Sheila Striped Camo bandana that is bought, a dollar is donated to the SPCA.

This two sided bandana is stitched not only on the inside but the top of the bandana as well. Double stitching ensures durability for your furry one.

These bandanas tie either in a double knot or a sailor knot.  

Bandana Options:

If you prefer Velcro, add a dollar onto the price and let me know the exact measurement of your pooches neck. 

Does your little one hate to dress up but keeps their collar on? Message me and ask for four holes for easier insertion for your belt collar. Just add a dollar!

Would you prefer a hold for an easy connection between your leash and collar? Just add a dollar.

All of these options are available through messaging. Just let me know. :) Enjoy the feeling of choice.

As always if shipping has a $2.00 or more difference, you are refunded through paypal.
